titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, the seventh day of October, one thousand six hundred and sixty three. Whereas his Majesty ... finding that many seditious and turbulent persons, ministers and others in the Kingdom of Ireland ... were coming over, expecting shelter here, ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Text almost entirely in black letter.
A proclamation concerning sedition being preached by ministers of religion from Ireland and also enforcing church attendance and citing persons to examine people without valid travel passes.
Ms. notes at foot of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
